coming_of_age.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
coming_of_age.author: Stephen Chbosky
coming_of_age.description: A coming-of-age story following Charlie through his freshman year of high school, exploring friendship, mental health, and self-discovery.

coming_of_age.title: The Catcher in the Rye
coming_of_age.author: J.D. Salinger
coming_of_age.description: Holden Caulfield's journey through New York City after being expelled from prep school, exploring themes of alienation and identity.

coming_of_age.title: Simon vs. the Homo Sapiens Agenda
coming_of_age.author: Becky Albertalli
coming_of_age.description: Sixteen-year-old Simon Spier is being blackmailed after his emails to another closeted gay student fall into the wrong hands.

fantasy_worldbuilding.title: The Name of the Wind
fantasy_worldbuilding.author: Patrick Rothfuss
fantasy_worldbuilding.description: Kvothe tells his own story: a tale of sorcery, adventure, and the complex magic system of sympathy in a richly detailed fantasy world.

fantasy_worldbuilding.title: Six of Crows
fantasy_worldbuilding.author: Leigh Bardugo
fantasy_worldbuilding.description: A heist story set in the fantasy world of Ketterdam, featuring a diverse crew with unique magical abilities called Grisha powers.

fantasy_worldbuilding.title: The Way of Kings
fantasy_worldbuilding.author: Brandon Sanderson
fantasy_worldbuilding.description: Epic fantasy with intricate world-building, featuring magical armor, weapons, and a hard magic system in the world of Roshar.

fantasy_worldbuilding.title: A Wizard of Earthsea
fantasy_worldbuilding.author: Ursula K. Le Guin
fantasy_worldbuilding.description: Young wizard Ged must face the consequences of his pride in a world where true names hold power and magic has a price.

dystopian.title: The Hunger Games
dystopian.author: Suzanne Collins
dystopian.description: Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her sister's place in a brutal televised fight to the death in dystopian Panem.

dystopian.title: Divergent
dystopian.author: Veronica Roth
dystopian.description: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris discovers she's Divergent and doesn't fit into any one group.

dystopian.author: George Orwell
dystopian.description: Winston Smith struggles against totalitarian oppression in a world of perpetual war, surveillance, and mind control.

dystopian.title: The Giver
dystopian.author: Lois Lowry
dystopian.description: Jonas lives in a seemingly perfect society without pain or choice, until he's chosen to receive all the memories of the past.

unreliable_narrators.title: We Were Liars
unreliable_narrators.author: E. Lockhart
unreliable_narrators.description: A mysterious story about a wealthy family's private island, with an unreliable narrator recovering from an accident she can't remember.

unreliable_narrators.title: Gone Girl
unreliable_narrators.author: Gillian Flynn
unreliable_narrators.description: A twisted thriller told from alternating perspectives, where nothing is as it seems in a marriage gone wrong.

unreliable_narrators.title: The Girl on the Train
unreliable_narrators.author: Paula Hawkins
unreliable_narrators.description: Rachel witnesses something shocking from her train window, but her alcoholic blackouts make her an unreliable witness.

character_driven.title: The Fault in Our Stars
character_driven.author: John Green
character_driven.description: Hazel and Gus are two teenagers who meet in a cancer support group and fall in love while grappling with mortality.

character_driven.title: Eleanor & Park
character_driven.author: Rainbow Rowell
character_driven.description: Two misfits slowly fall in love on the school bus, bonding over comic books and mixtapes in 1986.

character_driven.title: The Book Thief
character_driven.author: Markus Zusak
character_driven.description: Death narrates the story of Liesel, a girl living in Nazi Germany who steals books and shares them with others.

character_driven.title: Wonder
character_driven.author: R.J. Palacio
character_driven.description: Auggie Pullman, a boy with facial differences, starts mainstream school for the first time in fifth grade.
